Package net.roydesign.mac

Interface Summary
AppleEventHandler This interface is implemented by objects that wish to be notified of incoming Apple events.
MRJFolderConstants This interface defines some useful Mac OS constants to use with the MRJAdapter.findFolder() method.
 

Class Summary
MRJAdapter This class offers a unique interface to the functionality provided by MRJToolkit with MRJ 1.5, 2.x and 3.x, and com.apple.eawt and com.apple.eio with MRJ 4.x.
